languages.text: "Это... Странно. Мне докладывали о ренегатах и контрабандистах, резко прекративших свою богомерзкую деятельность на корабле, и я только порадовался. Разве кто-то скучает по крысам в кладовой? Однако сейчас пропадают верные подданные — и это уже совсем другое дело!"

traits.locale_text: "Это... Странно. Мне докладывали о ренегатах и контрабандистах, резко прекративших свою богомерзкую деятельность на корабле, и я только порадовался. Разве кто-то скучает по крысам в кладовой? Однако сейчас пропадают верные подданные — и это уже совсем другое дело!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"
languages.original_text: "Это... Странно. Мне докладывали о ренегатах и контрабандистах, резко прекративших свою богомерзкую деятельность на корабле, и я только порадовался. Разве кто-то скучает по крысам в кладовой? Однако сейчас пропадают верные подданные — и это уже совсем другое дело!"

traits.locale_text: "This is... Strange. I was told about the renegades and smugglers who abruptly stopped their godless activities on the voidship, of which I was immensely glad. Is there somebody who misses rats in their pantry? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time — and this is a completely different matter!
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is... Strange. I was told about the renegades and smugglers who abruptly stopped their godless activities on the voidship, of which I was immensely glad. Is there somebody who misses rats in their pantry? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time — and this is a completely different matter!
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “这可真是……太古怪了。我之前收到过报告，说某些叛徒突然失踪了，他们亵渎性的活动也戛然而止。我当时还挺高兴的，毕竟不会有人想念粮仓里的老鼠，没错吧？可这次失踪的却是忠诚的臣民，这就完全是另一回事了！”
languages.original_text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"

traits.locale_text: “这可真是……太古怪了。我之前收到过报告，说某些叛徒突然失踪了，他们亵渎性的活动也戛然而止。我当时还挺高兴的，毕竟不会有人想念粮仓里的老鼠，没错吧？可这次失踪的却是忠诚的臣民，这就完全是另一回事了！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Es... extraño. Anteriormente había recibido información sobre traidores y contrabandistas que detenían sus herejías repentinamente y me alegraba de oírlo. A fin de cuentas, que las ratas abandonen la despensa es bueno, ¿no? Sin embargo, esta vez estamos perdiendo a súbditos leales. ¡Es completamente diferente!».
languages.original_text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"

traits.locale_text: «Es... extraño. Anteriormente había recibido información sobre traidores y contrabandistas que detenían sus herejías repentinamente y me alegraba de oírlo. A fin de cuentas, que las ratas abandonen la despensa es bueno, ¿no? Sin embargo, esta vez estamos perdiendo a súbditos leales. ¡Es completamente diferente!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist ... seltsam. Ich habe schon früher Berichte über Abtrünnige und Schmuggler erhalten, die ihre gottlosen Aktivitäten an Bord plötzlich eingestellt haben, und ich war sehr froh, das zu hören — vermisst irgendjemand Ratten in seiner Speisekammer, frage ich Euch? Aber dieses Mal verschwinden treue Untertanen, und das ist eine ganz andere Sache!"
languages.original_text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"

traits.locale_text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Voilà qui est... étrange. J'ai reçu des rapports signalant l'arrêt brutal des pratiques impies des renégats et des contrebandiers à notre bord, et je m'en félicitais... Personne n'irait se plaindre de ne plus avoir de rats dans son garde-manger, n'est-ce pas ? Mais cette fois, ce sont de fidèles sujets qui ont disparu. L'affaire est d'une tout autre importance ! »
languages.original_text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"

traits.locale_text: « Voilà qui est... étrange. J'ai reçu des rapports signalant l'arrêt brutal des pratiques impies des renégats et des contrebandiers à notre bord, et je m'en félicitais... Personne n'irait se plaindre de ne plus avoir de rats dans son garde-manger, n'est-ce pas ? Mais cette fois, ce sont de fidèles sujets qui ont disparu. L'affaire est d'une tout autre importance ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「それは…妙な話だな。以前、反逆者や密輸業者が船内で神に背く行為をパタリとやめたという報告を受け、その話にとても喜んだものだ。食品庫からネズミが消えて寂しがる者などいないだろう？しかし、今回消えたのは忠実な家臣で、そうなると全く話が違ってくる！」
languages.original_text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"

traits.locale_text: 「それは…妙な話だな。以前、反逆者や密輸業者が船内で神に背く行為をパタリとやめたという報告を受け、その話にとても喜んだものだ。食品庫からネズミが消えて寂しがる者などいないだろう？しかし、今回消えたのは忠実な家臣で、そうなると全く話が違ってくる！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bu... Çok tuhaf. Muhaliflerin ve kaçakçıların gemideki tanrı tanımaz faaliyetlerini aniden sonlandırdıklarına dair raporlar almış ve bayağı sevinmiştim. Kimse kilerindeki sıçanları özlemez, haksız mıyım? Lakin bu kez sadık yurttaşlar ortadan kayboluyorsa işin boyutu değişir!"
languages.original_text: "That is... strange. I previously received reports about renegades and smugglers abruptly ceasing their godless activities on board, and I was immensely glad to hear it — does anyone miss having rats in their pantry, I ask you? However, loyal subjects are disappearing this time, and that is a completely different matter!"
